name: intextra.web
overview:
The intextra.web team is a part of Active Web Solutions Limited, an award winning, Microsoft Gold Partner software development and consultancy company.

Formed in September 1999, the company employs a team of hardworking and unusually skilled people who have built a reputation for putting customers first and working in a dedicated and professional way to help them achieve practical, business led solutions.

The intextra.web team work closely with their website clients to develop stunning, dynamic and customer focused websites that help to improve Search Engine rankings and Conversion Rates. Their clients tend to have unique sets of requirements and the manner in which they approach each one tends to reflect their individual needs.

Although they are principly a web development and integration company they have strategically aligned themselves with the UK’s leading SEO, CRO and Digital Marketing companies, HP Group Ltd, to provide their clients with a seamless end to end service.
